website_summaries.verdict: Engineered specifically shot put, discus, and hammer throw track competitions, the Saucony Unleash SD 2 optimizes the spin and glide technique of the athlete. The technical features implemented in the platform highlights secure lockdown, preventing any form of slippage. With the reliable outsole construction of the track shoe, throwers can expect sturdy grip, regardless of surface texture.
pros: Several throwers hail the comfort of the Saucony Unleash SD 2
The track and field shoe has a secure fit, commended various commenters
Multiple reviewers find the shot put shoe extremely light
A lot of the track athletes claim that the throwing shoe maximizes their rotations
There are numerous purchasers who laud the support provided by the platform
It has good value for money, expressed a few buyers
cons: According to several wearers, the shoe needs some break-in period
The plate of the track spike lacks durability, shared quite a few customers
A couple of critics have remarked that the track throwing shoe has a stiff underfoot

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fit is a shade tight, and soles are very stiff.
customer_reviews.text: First off, these are quality shoes. The build is excellent and the soles are fast without being too slick. The soles are VERY stiff, and help you stay on your toes. You cannot flatten your foot in these! My only complaint is the fit is about a half size small (but not uncomfortably so).
customer_reviews.author: John Kuemmerlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Throwers Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe also for women throwing disc, hammer, weight, and shot. Wears well considering the circle grind. *Adjust your size accordingly from men's to women's.
customer_reviews.author: SnowDaze

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These tore up the second time my son wore them. He only wore for track meets. The sole fell off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice spin
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the rotation he gets in these, did take a little getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: WALSH

customer_reviews.title: Better than Nike’s.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one size down than my sons normal shoe size because they need to fit tight for throwing. They are great quality and would buy again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: kristin craft

customer_reviews.title: You need a good pair of throwing shoes, here you go.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, gives a great spin, not really meant for gliding but it can do it. Take a while to get settled into them since they’re new. I use them for disc and shot with rotation and shuffling.
customer_reviews.author: GraceAnn

customer_reviews.title: Schock put shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoys them for his track schock put and he fits well in tgem.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Great for spinning!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter. She has the unleash sd but finally wore out the bottom after season and 1/2. She loves these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Goldy

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this purchase. I have had them for a couple months now and they still look brand new. Amazingly comfortable as well
customer_reviews.author: Seth Curry

customer_reviews.title: Too much structure
customer_reviews.text: Buy the nikes trust me these have too much structure it’ll be best ecspecially for new throwers
customer_reviews.author: terry b.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable track shoe
customer_reviews.text: Liked this shoe. Very comfortable and easy to turn in the discus ring. 0
customer_reviews.author: Janice Akin

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These seem tight but throwing shoes are expensive to be tight
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Throwing Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great throwing shoe. This is the 3rd pair I've bought for my son.
customer_reviews.author: tony

product_meta.title: Saucony Unisex Adults’ Unleash Sd2 Track and Field Shoe
product_meta.description: The unleash sd 2 will help you with all of that. Made for the shotput, discus, and hammer throw, the newly formulated upper features our is of it technology, which improves the overall fit and feel, allowing you to power through your throws and on to victory.
feature_bullets: Surface: Concrete, Asphalt or some other Firm, Non-Slip Material
ISOFIT system provides stabilizing support while adapting to the movement of the foot
FLEXFILM upper is lightweight and supportive
Midfoot cross strap locks foot to platform
Internal EVA midsole for underfoot cushioning
Nylon forefoot plate and high-density rubber outsole enhance spin and glide techniques
